Record.Description: A condition characterized by the growth of unencapsulated masses of ADIPOSE TISSUE symmetrically deposited around the neck, shoulders, or other sites around the body.Diffuse lipomatosis of the neck. It is also known as fat neck or horsecollar lipomata.
